text: The 2019 Formula One World Championship is the 70th season of the Formula One World Championship. The motor racing championship is the highest class of competition for open-wheel racing cars. The 2019 season started with the Australian Grand Prix on March 17 2019, and ended with Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on December 1 2019. == Grands Prix winners== Round Grand Prix Pole position Fastest lap
